mapper.insert: MERGE INTO CART USING DUAL ON (M_NO=#{m_no} AND P_NO=#{p_no} AND P_SIZE=#{p_size}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PAY_QUANTITY = PAY_QUANTITY + #{pay_quantity} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (C_NO, M_NO, P_NO, PAY_QUANTITY, P_SIZE, P_COLOR) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{m_no}, #{p_no}, #{pay_quantity}, #{p_size}, 'red')
mapper.delete: DELETE CART WHERE M_NO=#{m_no} AND P_NO=#{p_no} AND P_SIZE=#{p_size}
mapper.select: SELECT P_NAME, CART.P_NO, P_PRICE, C_NO, P_IMG, P_DISCOUNT,CART.P_SIZE, PAY_QUANTITY, (P_PRICE * PAY_QUANTITY) AS P_SUM FROM CART , PRODUCT WHERE M_NO=#{m_no} AND product.p_no = CART.P_NO ORDER BY CART.P_NO
